title: Drawing, "Gemini, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, light brown wash, over graphite on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, upper right: Gemini per la prima/ vera 3; in graphite upper center: gemini 3; in graphite: squared off at sides 1-4 and at top and bottom 1-8 with light source symbol at upper left.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Gemini, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05.
1804–05. Pen and brown ink, light brown wash, over graphite on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1185.
